long_description: . Author: William L. Sullivan. Softcover, 256 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Navillus Press; copyright 2010. Detailed pages about this scenic region including Crater Lake National Park, the Rogue River and Mount Shasta. Includes 56 hikes for families with children. Each hike includes difficulty rating, distance, elevation gain and seasonal closures.
short_description: 100 Hikes in Southern Oregon provides detailed information on hikes in southern Oregon and northern California, including many suitable for children.
